1. Florida man sneezes his intestines out of his body at restaurant  The Independent
  2. From torn lungs to fractured ears, how dangerous can sneezing really be  Firstpost
  3. 'Bowel evisceration': US man sneezes his intestines out of his body at a public restaurant  The Times of India
  4. US man sneezed so forcefully that his intestines came out. He is alive  India Today
  5. What Happens When There Is A Sudden Trauma Or Harm To A Surgical Incision Site?  TheHealthSite
